title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The issue is that there is too much flashing happening in the Control Example.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window only in the vertical direction, it can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, without any flashing of the tabs in the TabFolder.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window only in the vertical direction.
3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
